Needles.description: Indicates if needles appear in the video.

Explosions.description: Indicates if explosions appear in the video.

Drowning.description: Indicates if drowning appears in the video.

Car_Crash.description: Indicates if a car crash appears in the video.

Spiders.description: Indicates if spiders appear in the video.

Timestamps.description: A JSON-like string representing timestamps for triggers, e.g., {"Needles": ["00:01:23", "00:05:12"], "Explosions": ["00:02:45"]}
